ygData.subject: Re: Obsessive compulsive behavior begins.
ygData.msgSnippet: Ice:: She smiled and put Lunarpine down gently. She closed her eyes and concentrated on Veratis.  She looked inside Veratis mind and searched for the thoughts

Ice::

She smiled and put Lunarpine down gently. She closed her eyes and 
concentrated on Veratis.  She looked inside Veratis' mind and 
searched for the thoughts on LadyHawk.  She found some in the back of 
his mind. She whispered while she kept looking. "She is one of his 
group. She is,"takes a deep breath," looking for the same things that 
FoxFingers is. Samples, to help create the new bot forms. Fulling the 
prophecy of Primus." she stopped and opened her eyes, but the link 
was still there. She stared at the wall. "He is, worried about her. 
She has not returned and he is concerned."
Her body trembled slightly, she hadn't yet kept a link up this long 
and it was starting to drain her.  She tried to keep focused. "She 
was one of his students and.....and..." She lowered her head and 
slumped her shoulders as she lost the connection. She was breating 
hard from the effort. "I'm sorry, I can't keep it up any longer."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> "Not to bad, now put me down and get inside Veratis' head, I want 
to 
> know about someone called Lady Hawk." He didn't want to go this 
way, 
> he wanted to know who she was and why she seemed so important.
>
